title: ywnasdzkd
author: ywnasdzkd
content: The default number of connections (nodes) Bitcoin Core works with is 125: 10 outbound and 115 inbound.I use the command "bitcoin - maxconnections=300", and then I use the command "bitcoin cli getconnectioncount". The output connectioncount is still 10. What should I do to achieve 15 outbound and 200 inbound connections?
